about_the_game: Alison is an ADULT VISUAL NOVEL. In Alison Fall of the Apple, you play as Michael (default name). Michael is a highly trained military veteran who has been working as a police officer in NYC since the disappearance of his pregnant wife a few years ago. While on patrol, MC saves the life of a young woman named Alison. After rescuing Alison, your life is thrown into chaos with thugs, hitmen, and the corrupt elite of the Big Apple trying to hunt you both down. With lives on the line, choices will matter and decisions will have major consequences, for you and those around you. Help Alice escape her fate and perhaps even uncover the truth behind the disappearance of your wife.
